title: Drawing, "Chest of Drawers (Three) with Bookcase", ca. 1930s
medium:
Graphite; ruled border in graphite
Support: tracing paper
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite circled at center right: OK. Inscribed in graphite at lower left: 8 Inscribed in red color pencil at lower right: P
description:
Wide three-drawer chest backed by four-shelf bookcase. Base of chest  and sides of drawers are curved and aligned with base and three lower shelves of bookcase,
Drawers have two knobs each, left and right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Chest of Drawers (Three) with Bookcase", ca. 1930s.
ca. 1930s. Graphite; ruled border in graphite
Support: tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-697.
